item.title: Aggressive Npc's
item.dc:creator: @Patrick_M_25 Patrick M 25
item.description:
@Patrick_M_25 wrote:

Alright, I was messing around with some fight caves ideas, and as soon as I got it done, I compiled, and then when i got on the server, all my npc’s are aggressive now…

Here’s my codes in my NPCHandler:

[code]for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    >= 5) {
                                npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
                for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
                    client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    >= 5) {

if (npcs[i].npcType != 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 2883 || npcs[i].npcType == 50 || npcs[i].npcType == 2060 || npcs[i].npcType == 2628 || npcs[i].npcType == 2629 || npcs[i].npcType == 2630 || npcs[i].npcType == 2631 || npcs[i].npcType == 2632 || npcs[i].npcType == 2640) {
npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}
}
}
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
client person = (client) p;

                    if (p != null && person != null) {
                        if (p != null && person != null) { 
                            if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX,
                                    npcs[i].absY)
                                    <= 20
                                            && p.heightLevel
                                                    == npcs[i].heightLevel) {

if (npcs[i].npcType != 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 2883 || npcs[i].npcType == 50 || npcs[i].npcType == 2060 || npcs[i].npcType == 2628 || npcs[i].npcType == 2629 || npcs[i].npcType == 2630 || npcs[i].npcType == 2631 || npcs[i].npcType == 2632 || npcs[i].npcType == 2640) {
npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(
npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY)
>= 21
|| person.heightLevel
!= npcs[i].heightLevel) {
if (npcs[i].npcType != 1158 || npcs[i].npcType == 2745 || npcs[i].npcType == 2883 || npcs[i].npcType == 50 || npcs[i].npcType == 2060 || npcs[i].npcType == 2628 || npcs[i].npcType == 2629 || npcs[i].npcType == 2630 || npcs[i].npcType == 2631 || npcs[i].npcType == 2632 || npcs[i].npcType == 2640) {
npcs[i].RandomWalk = true;
}
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

You see anything wrong with this that might mess with the other npc’s?

Help would be really sweet.

Read full topic
